content: Hey, can an admin disable the "WIP" bot on the www.rust-lang.org repository? It's no longer needed since this functionality is builtin to GitHub.
@Pietro Albini Thanks, is it possible to add dependabot to the website? I don't want to do that right now, as it still has a lot of out of date dependencies that need to be addressed first.
I don't see a reason why we couldn't add it
